projects.title: Weather App
projects.body: Quick search of city displaying current weather and forecasted weather of the next five days of it's highs and lows. Utilized OpenWeatherAPI and GeoDB for back-end.

projects.title: Path Visualization
projects.body: Created with pygame for visuals and user interaction, allows user to draw obstacles between start and end, graphically showcases how Breadth Depth Search to find the shortest path

projects.title: Happy Feet
projects.body: Submitted for HackDavis 2023 Hackathon. Designed for AggieReuse, it's a motion tracker to track foot traffic into the store. After storing and analyzing foot traffic we are able to use machine learning in order to predict when the store should be open and how many employees should be on the clock.
